import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const { pathname } = useLocation(); return (

LOGO

LOGO
  • Home
  • Link
  • Our Work
    • Latest works
    • Works History
    • archives
  • News
  • About
  • Contact
  • Language
    • English
    • Dutch
    • Arabic
); }; export default Navbar;
